queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:soneritics_kiyoh_totals`( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `url` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `total_score` DECIMAL(2,1) NOT NULL, `total_reviews` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:soneritics_kiyoh_reviews`( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `review_id` INT NOT NULL, `customer_name` VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, `customer_place` VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, `total_score` INT NOT NULL, `recommendation` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, `positive` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `negative` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `purchase` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `reaction` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `image` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `date` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX `review_id` (`review_id`) );
